bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with qian xuan 錢癬 , coin[-size] xuan -illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu jin 木槿 quotes Jing yan fang 經驗方 : 荷錢癬瘡：巴豆仁三個，連油杵泥，以生絹包擦，日一 二次，三日痊好 , “For lotus germ-bud xuan -illness sores : 3 kernels of ba dou are to be pounded with their own oil until they form a pulp. This is wrapped in acloth made from raw silk to rub [the afflicted region] once or twice daily. After three days a complete cure will be achieved”.
